game.name: The Sims™ 3 Pets
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Create perfect—or imperfect—pets for your Sims, from fierce guard dogs to destructive kittens to trusty horses and more as you determine not only how your Sims’ pets look but their personality traits as well.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Create perfect—or imperfect—pets for your Sims, from fierce guard dogs to destructive kittens to trusty horses and more as you determine not only how your Sims’ pets look but their personality traits as well.
